law.catch_line: Training of probation and parole officers regarding sexual offender registration laws -- Necessary documents.

text.section:
Each probation and parole officer shall be trained in the requirements of the sexual offender registration laws and shall be able to:
Register or reregister a sexual offender; and
Answer questions about the sexual offender registration law and its requirements.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 321, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 26, effective July 12, 2006.
